timeline.bodyText: Don't you think you should be using delete instead of get in this test ?
timeline.author: varung-31
varung-31

timeline.bodyText:
You can also add an assert here as -
assertThat(response.getStatus(), equalTo(404));
timeline.author: varung-31

replies.bodyText: Yeah I know, but just because the method name says 404, you might consider adding it.
replies.author: varung-31
